stimulusHtml: A satellite S is in an elliptical orbit around a planet P , as shown above, with r1 and r2 being its closest and farthest distances, respectively, from the center of the planet. If the satellite has a speed v1 at its closest distance, what is its speed at its farthest distance?
choicesHtml: r 1 r 2 v 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CA0@

r 2 r1 v 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C2C@

( r 2 − r 1 ) v 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F06@

r 1 + r 2 2 v 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E3E@

r 2 − r 1 r 1 + r 2 v 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42BC@
